article.title: Northrop Grumman to Provide Aircraft Radar Pods
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corp., Linthicum Heights, Md., is being awarded a $30 million indefinite-quantity/indefinite-delivery contract for contractor logistics support services in support of the AN/ASQ-236 aircraft radar pod. The contracting activity is Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Eglin Air Force Base, Fla.
